skills.name: Planetary Nebula
skills.description: [SP: 6][CD: 16s] An underground blaze erupts and explodes near wielder, dealing 800% + 200% ATK of Fire DMG and inflicting Flared state lasting 10s on hit. Flared enemies take 15.0% bonus Fire DMG. Spina Astera equip bonus: Astral Flare deals 10% ATK of bonus Fire DMG on Flared enemies.

skills.name: Electron Degeneracy
skills.description:
Basic, Charged, and Combo ATK deal 20.0% bonus Total DMG to Flared enemies.
Spina Astera equip bonus: She restores 10 Astrum per second when on standby.
